message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but we can always negotiate in the next rounds.
Alice, your offer was a bit one-sided. Let's be more reasonable. I think 60/40 is a fair split.
Okay, let's compromise. I'll take 55, you take 45.  It's closer to your proposal, and we can move towards a deal.
Alice, I'm sticking to my principles.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and most efficient way to settle this.
